products.name: Galaxy S10
products.description: The next generation Samsung Galaxy S10 is as powerful, intelligent and intuitive as you are, providing endless possibilities and next- level power in performance, productivity, creation and design. The S10 features pro lenses to capture stunning photos, a powerful processor, and a long-lasting battery to optimize power and performance.
specs: 6.1" Infinity Display, Quad HD+ Dynamic AMOLED
12MP Super Speed Dual Pixel ; 16MP Ultra Wide ; 12MP 2x Zoom

products.name: Q70T QLED 4K UHD HDR Smart TV (2020)
products.description: Equipped with Quantum Dot Technology, this TV unleashes a massive spectrum of a billion shades of color. Samsung's powerful 4K Quantum processor automatically optimizes the picture to deliver a more immersive experience. A sleek, elegant, and minimalistic design from any angle draws you into the screen.
specs: QUANTUM PROCESSOR 4K: This powerful processor uses deep learning AI to transform everything you watch into stunning 4K.
MOTION RATE 240: Minimizes motion blur on screen, so action-packed movies and sports stay smooth and crisp.
AMBIENT MODE +: Blends into your space by turning a blank screen into enticing visuals or at-a-glance info.
QUANTUM HDR: Expands the range of color and detail beyond what's possible on HDTVs.
DUAL LED: A system of dedicated warm and cool LED backlights enhance contrast details.
ALEXA BUILT-IN: Voice control your TV and your day, hands-free. Just ask Alexa to change the channel, search for movies, play music, control smart home devices, get sports updates and more.
